air:AirPriceRsp.common_v47_0:ResponseMessage: Taxes returned at the FareInfo level are for informational purposes only, and may differ from those returned at the Itinerary/Passenger Type levels.

air:Brand.Name: GoLight
air:Brand.air:Title: GoLight
GoLight
air:Brand.air:Text:
Choose Aegean, Europes Best Regional Airline, and discover why customers come back to us time after time.
GoLight fares offer the best deals, with passengers to receive Aegean’s full service benefits on board and on the ground.
- checked baggage available at a fee if required - hand luggage included (1 bag up to 8 kg) - complimentary Greek Cuisine meal and drinks on board - mileage accrual - check-in 48 hours - 30 min. before departure

Choose Aegean, Europes Best Regional Airline, and discover why customers come back to us time after time.
GoLight fares offer the best deals, with passengers to receive Aegean’s full service benefits on board and on the ground.
- checked baggage available at a fee if required - hand luggage included (1 bag up to 8 kg) - complimentary Greek Cuisine meal and drinks on board - mileage accrual - check-in 48 hours - 30 min. before departure

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Snacks and drinks on board
Complimentary snacks and drinks are available on board all Aegean Airlines flights.
Complimentary snacks and drinks are available on board all Aegean Airlines flights.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Snacks and drinks on board
Snacks

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Cancelling your reservation
We understand that from time to time you may need to cancel your reservation. The amount you will have to pay depends on the route and class booked.
We understand that from time to time you may need to cancel your reservation. The amount you will have to pay depends on the route and class booked.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Refunds
Refunds

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Extra space
In Business Class the middle seat is always kept free to allow our passengers additional space to relax or work.
In Business Class the middle seat is always kept free to allow our passengers additional space to relax or work.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Middle seat free
Xtra space

air:OptionalService.air:Text: A space to work or relax

Take time to visit the Aegean Airlines Business Class lounge, designed to offer you the chance to take time out and unwind before starting your journey or making a connection. Complimentary snacks and drinks are available as is internet access.

Take time to visit the Aegean Airlines Business Class lounge, designed to offer you the chance to take time out and unwind before starting your journey or making a connection. Complimentary snacks and drinks are available as is internet access.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Lounge access
Lounges

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Earn and save
Miles can be accrued in all Aegean Airlines booking classes, then redeemable on a variety of exclusive awards.
Miles can be accrued in all Aegean Airlines booking classes, then redeemable on a variety of exclusive awards.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Mileage accrual
Miles

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Check in your bags

No checked bags are included for GoLight fares, however can be booked for an additional fee of 30 EUR (40 EUR from 01 July to 10 September).
In Flex Economy or Saver Economy fares, 1 bag up to 23 kg.
In Business, 2 bags up to 32 kg each.
When booking additional bags via the shopping cart use the following freeform text : Excess Baggage

No checked bags are included for GoLight fares, however can be booked for an additional fee of 30 EUR (40 EUR from 01 July to 10 September).
In Flex Economy or Saver Economy fares, 1 bag up to 23 kg.
In Business, 2 bags up to 32 kg each.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Checked baggage
Hold bags

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Choose your favourite seat in advance
Do you prefer window, aisle or just seats together? Economy Flex and Business Class passengers can pre select their choice in advance.
Do you prefer window, aisle or just seats together? Economy Flex and Business Class passengers can pre select their choice in advance.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Advance seat reservation
Pre seat

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Avoid the queues at the airport
Business Class passengers can avoid queues at airport security by taking advantage of the fast lane.
Business Class passengers can avoid queues at airport security by taking advantage of the fast lane.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Fast track
Fast lane

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Make changes to your reservation when required
If you wish to make changes to your reservation then the amount you will have to pay will be dependent on the level of class you have booked.
If you wish to make changes to your reservation then the amount you will have to pay will be dependent on the level of class you have booked.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Rebooking
Rebooking

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Taking bags on board
Carry on board 1 bag up to 8 kg in Economy Class, or 2 bags up to 8kg and 5 kg respectively in Business Class.
Carry on board 1 bag up to 8 kg in Economy Class, or 2 bags up to 8kg and 5 kg respectively in Business Class.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Hand baggage
Hand bags

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Exclusive check in area
Business Class passengers can check in at a separate exclusive zone, and board the aircraft before other passengers.
Business Class passengers can check in at a separate exclusive zone, and board the aircraft before other passengers.
air:OptionalService.air:Title: Priority check in and boarding
Priority

air:AirPricingInfo.air:FareCalc: IEV A3 X/ATH Q2.26 A3 PAR Q2.26 20.00P0BAGTI NUC24.52END ROE1.0

air:TextInfo.air:Text: BAGGAGE DISCOUNTS MAY APPLY BASED ON FREQUENT FLYER STATUS/ ONLINE CHECKIN/FORM OF PAYMENT/MILITARY/ETC.

air:Brand.Name: Flex
air:Brand.air:Title: Flex
Flex
air:Brand.air:Text:
Choose Aegean, Europes Best Regional Airline, and discover why customers come back to us time after time.
Passengers that need more flexibility when planning their journey and do not want to pay rebooking fees, can make unlimited changes. Also included are:
- 1 free checked baggage allowance (23kgs) - hand luggage included (1 bag up to 8 kg) - complimentary Greek Cuisine meal and drinks on board - mileage accrual - check-in 48 hours - 30 min. before departure
Upgrade to Flex fares which include one free checked bag

Choose Aegean, Europes Best Regional Airline, and discover why customers come back to us time after time.
